productivity.name: google-tasks
productivity.description: Manage Google Tasks - get, add, complete, and delete tasks with optional due dates and notes.

productivity.name: notion-tasks
productivity.description: Manage tasks in Notion - get, add, complete, and delete tasks with support for due dates and filtering.
voice_triggers: What's on my Notion task list?
Add task buy groceries due Friday
productivity.author: cmac86

Where is Arsenal in the table?
